summary: Meet Sharkaria the Argonian Mage...well a short story she was from Winterhold she was suceed to be a OVERPOWER mage...to overpower...well she wants to keep away from everyone of it and she moved to Whiterun and take a Seat at the Bannered Mare...so...You Can Find Her There.
descriptionHtml:
Meet Sharkaria the Argonian Mage...well a short story she was from Winterhold she was suceed to be a OVERPOWER mage...to overpower...well she wants to keep away from everyone of it and she moved to Whiterun and take a Seat at the Bannered Mare...so...You Can Find Her There.Well still some Men in Skyrim are very Interesting her too...she doesn't have a tail...and that guy is going to be Barbecue...

Caution-Be careful using her...she is too Overpower she will using Fireball to Blow Everyone Away
and it may Alert the Guards Too...You Have Been Warned.

Name-Sharkaria
Voice-FemaleEvenToned
Combat Style-csHumanMagic
Spells-Fireball(L),Fire Breath Shout
Relationships-Player's Ally
Factions-You can Marry her for figthing against Bosses or Dragons.

A Female Argonian Follower and NPC.
Just like normal NPCs... still got some outfit with others mods...

Credits
Thanks to the Mod Creators or Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
The requirement needed for the NPC is..
CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888/?.
FAR - Forgotten Argonian Roots by redtox
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42043/?
Argonian Tail Remover by tiagopsyko
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4385/?
Bikini-Trouble CHSBHC by golgappa
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51207/?
TERA Weapons Collection for Skyrim by Iromizu
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27463/?
CHSBHC Conversions with BBP by Nimbonius(KK Barkeeper V5)Only.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7475/?
ONLY...and that's all.
author: CyrusHawke
